metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13322 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was discovered in GitLab versions after 12.9. Due to improper verification of permissions, an unauthorized user can create and delete deploy tokens.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
